name: tip-genius
description: AI-powered soccer match predictions with a modern, responsive web interface.

scripts.generate:version: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const d=new Date(); const v=d.getFullYear().toString().slice(2)+('0'+(d.getMonth()+1)).slice(-2)+('0'+d.getDate()).slice(-2)+('0'+d.getHours()).slice(-2)+('0'+d.getMinutes()).slice(-2); fs.writeFileSync('public/version.json', JSON.stringify({version:v,buildDate:d.toISOString()}));"
